alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 2:21AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow showers and areas of blowing snow. The heaviest snow is expected through 5 AM with a few showers lingering through 8 AM. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Williams. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Doney Park 1 to 3 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Jacob Lake 0 to 1 inches Prescott 0 to 1 inches Prescott Valley 0 to 1 inches Sedona 0 to 1 inches Seligman 0 to 1 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
